Feature: Workplace/Organizational Layer Value Recognition for Young Adult
  As a young adult in my first full-time professional role
  Operating at the workplace/organizational governance layer
  I want to understand my labor's value and maintain wholeness
  So that I build professional capability while preserving personal well-being

  Background:
    Given the Elohim Protocol is operational
    And the young_adult user "Aisha" is registered in the system
    And Aisha works full-time earning $38,000 annually
    And this is her first professional position
    And the workplace governance context is active
    And the workplace_elohim could coordinate organizational care economy
    And Aisha is learning to navigate workplace dynamics

  Scenario: Understanding labor value in first professional role
    Given Aisha is working her first full-time job
    And she's unsure if compensation is fair
    When the workplace_elohim analyzes her position
    Then it should provide market rate information
    And it should help her understand her labor's actual value
    And it should identify if compensation is equitable
    And the system should empower negotiation with information
    And she should learn to advocate for fair compensation
    And workplace care economy should make value transparent

  Scenario: Recognizing when workplace demands become unsustainable
    Given Aisha faces intense workplace expectations
    And she often works long hours
    When the personal_agent monitors her workplace patterns
    Then it should flag when demands are unsustainable
    And it should recognize that she's worked through lunch repeatedly
    And it should identify when work-life balance is failing
    And the system should help her see overwork clearly
    And she should be supported in setting boundaries
    And workplace care economy should prevent exploitation

  Scenario: Personal agent helps maintain well-being during work pressure
    Given Aisha's job is demanding
    And professional pressures are intense
    When work stress affects her health
    Then the personal_agent should prioritize her well-being
    And it should flag declining self-care patterns
    And it should remind her that personal health enables professional contribution
    And the system should validate self-care as essential, not optional
    And she should learn that sustainable work requires personal stewardship
    And wholeness should be preserved despite workplace demands

  Scenario: Learning professional norms through care economy lens
    Given Aisha is learning professional workplace culture
    And she's developing professional identity
    When the workplace_elohim guides her professional development
    Then it should help her understand workplace care economy
    And it should teach that her work is care labor (contributing to organizational flourishing)
    And it should explain that she deserves care in return
    And professional development should include care economy literacy
    And she should learn to apply care principles to employment
    And workplace norms should be understood through care framework

  Scenario: Workplace skills development tracked and valued
    Given Aisha is building professional capabilities
    And skill development benefits both her and employer
    When the workplace_elohim tracks her skill growth
    Then it should recognize learning as valuable labor
    And it should help her advocate for development opportunities
    And it should track skills acquired for her career benefit
    And professional growth should be visible and valued
    And the system should ensure development serves her long-term interests
    And skill building should be recognized as mutual investment

  Scenario: Balancing workplace contribution with personal capacity
    Given Aisha has limited energy and time
    And workplace demands compete with personal needs
    When Aisha allocates her care capacity
    Then the personal_agent should help her balance commitments
    And it should recognize that workplace care is one of multiple obligations
    And it should flag when work encroaches on essential personal care
    And the system should support sustainable allocation of capacity
    And she should learn that professional success requires personal foundation
    And work-life balance should be actively maintained

  Scenario: Workplace privacy maintained from personal life
    Given Aisha's workplace should not access personal data
    And she has full privacy rights
    When workplace and personal systems interact
    Then strict privacy boundaries must be enforced
    And workplace should have zero access to personal life data
    And personal_agent should protect her information
    And workplace_elohim should respect privacy completely
    And the system should prevent workplace surveillance
    And professional and personal spheres should remain separate

  Scenario: Recognizing workplace emotional labor
    Given Aisha performs emotional labor at work
    And emotional labor is typically unrecognized
    When the workplace_elohim tracks her contributions
    Then emotional labor should be valued explicitly
    And relationship maintenance, conflict resolution, and care for colleagues should count
    And the full scope of her work should be visible
    And invisible emotional work should be recognized
    And workplace care economy should value all forms of labor
    And she should understand emotional labor as legitimate work

  Scenario: Negotiating for fair compensation with data support
    Given Aisha deserves fair pay for her labor
    And she lacks negotiation experience
    When Aisha prepares for salary negotiation
    Then the workplace_elohim should provide supporting data
    And it should show market rates for her role
    And it should quantify value of her contributions
    And it should provide negotiation strategy guidance
    And the system should empower her advocacy
    And care economy principles should support fair compensation

  Scenario: Identifying toxic workplace patterns early
    Given Aisha is inexperienced with workplace dynamics
    And toxic workplaces can be normalizing
    When the workplace_elohim monitors organizational patterns
    Then it should flag exploitative practices
    And it should identify when workplace violates care principles
    And it should help her recognize red flags
    And the system should protect her from normalizing abuse
    And she should learn what healthy workplace care looks like
    And early warning should enable protective action

  Scenario: Professional development aligned with personal values
    Given Aisha is building her career
    And she wants work aligned with her values
    When Aisha makes professional development decisions
    Then the personal_agent should help her assess value alignment
    And it should highlight opportunities matching her principles
    And it should flag when work conflicts with core values
    And professional growth should support personal integrity
    And the system should help her build career consistent with values
    And work should serve her flourishing, not just employment

  Scenario: Workplace care economy recognizes all organizational contributions
    Given organizational success depends on many forms of labor
    And Aisha contributes in multiple ways
    When the workplace_elohim tracks organizational care
    Then it should recognize diverse contributions
    And it should value mentoring, knowledge sharing, and culture building
    And it should make invisible organizational care visible
    And all work supporting collective flourishing should count
    And comprehensive care accounting should inform organizational decisions
    And she should understand the full value she provides

  Scenario: Transitioning between jobs with care economy continuity
    Given Aisha may change jobs during her young adult years
    And job transitions are stressful
    When Aisha considers changing positions
    Then the workplace_elohim should support transition planning
    And it should help her assess new opportunities through care lens
    And it should maintain record of skills and contributions
    And career development should be continuous across jobs
    And the system should support healthy professional mobility
    And care economy principles should guide job transitions
